input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents
input_text.Response A:
Sure thing! Here's a product description for the Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet in short, simple language:

"Wow, look at this cool helmet! It's pink and purple and has a special visor that snaps into place. It's super light and has lots of air holes to keep your head cool. Plus, it's really safe and has a special fit system to make sure it's comfy. It's perfect for your bike rides!"
input_text.Response B: Get ready to turn heads on your next cycling ride with the Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet. With its sleek and stylish design, this helmet will make you feel confident and comfortable on the road. The in-mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner provides superior protection, while the snap-fit visor keeps the sun out of your eyes. The Acu Dial fit system ensures a secure and comfortable fit, and the 20 vents keep your head cool and dry. Whether you're a seasoned cyclist or just starting out, the Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet is a great choice.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
